title: Wild boar ragù
description: This slow-cooked stew of wild boar with juniper berries and black olives is great served with freshly cooked pappardelle pasta and shavings of parmesan.
ingredients: 4 rashers rindless smoked streaky bacon or pancetta, cut into 1cm/½in slices
75g/2½oz pitted black olives, rinsed, drained and sliced
2 tsp juniper berries, lightly crushed in a pestle and mortar
1 rosemary stalk, around 12cm/4½in long, leaves finely chopped
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
freshly cooked pappardelle pasta, to serve
